tr.td: Location of sar source in source tree. Defaults to ${maven.src.dir}.
Location of the assembly.xml file. Defaults to ${maven.sar.src}/conf/assembly.xml.
Location of the config.xml file. Defaults to ${maven.sar.src}/conf/config.xml.
Location of the environment.xml file. Defaults to ${maven.sar.src}/conf/environment.xml.
Directory where the sar will be generated. Defaults to ${maven.build.dir}.
Boolean to metagenerate xinfo from source. Defaults to false.
Directory of the metagenerate source. Defaults to ${maven.src.dir}/java.
Files to include in metagenerate source. Defaults to **/*.java. Files are relative to ${maven.sar.metagenerate.src}.
Files to exclude in metagenerate source. Defaults to none. Files are relative to ${maven.sar.metagenerate.src}.
Artifacts to include in sar. Defaults to ${pom.artifactId}*.jar. Files are relative to ${maven.sar.build.dir}.
Artifacts to exclude in sar. Defaults to none. Files are relative to ${maven.sar.build.dir}.
